data.actual_result: Client resizes (you will see a black bar at the bottom) and predictive text going out of bounds.
data.expected_result: Keyboard and emote picker should look normal without any overlapping or resizing issues.
data.short_description: [iPad Split View] Client resizes and predictive text going out of bounds when changing split screen size with emote picker opened
data.steps_to_repro: - Open another app in Split View mode with Discord - Open the new Discord emote picker - Change the size in Split View mode of the other app with emote picker being still opened (e.g. from 75-25 to 50-50) - Observe the emote picker/keyboard
